Subskills.name: Bucthering Skill
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using brutalizing slash.

Subskills.name: Bonebreaker
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by brutalizing slash.

Subskills.name: Pummeling Slashwave
Subskills.description: Unleash a slash wave on attack inflicting increased bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Unstoppable Rage
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using brutalizing slash.

Subskills.name: Descent to Madness
Subskills.description: Increases attack speed when using brutalizing slash.

Subskills.name: With 2 Hands
Subskills.description: Chance on attack to unleash an additional brutalizing slash.

Subskills.name: Skullsplitter
Subskills.description: Increases the critical strike damage dealt by brutalizing slash.

Subskills.name: Afterlife Burner
Subskills.description: Chance on kill for the target to explode into a pile of corpses.

Subskills.name: Meet Daisy
Subskills.description: Every third attack unleashes daisy with increased damage and critical strike damage. The size of daisy is increased based on your missing life.

Subskills.name: Precision Equals Power
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by brutalizing slash based on your dexterity.

Subskills.name: For the Weak
Subskills.description: Increases the attack range of brutalizing slash based on your strength.

Subskills.name: Bleeding the Prey
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to bleeding targets.

Subskills.name: Painmongering
Subskills.description: Gain a stack of painmongering on hit increasing the tick frequency of bleed.

Subskills.name: Gutting Frenzy
Subskills.description: Chance to unleashes a ripple of blood on hit dealing increased critical damage based on your strength.
